src:
近年は暑い札幌…今年８月、３０度以上が８日間

01 Nov 2019, 13:30



マラソンの発着点として有力視されている大通公園（１日午後、札幌市中央区で）＝松本拓也撮影

　東京の暑さを理由に会場が変更されたマラソンと競歩だが、近年は札幌も暑い。
　現行の日程では女子マラソンが８月２日、男子マラソンは同９日に開催される。過去３０年の最高気温の平均は両日とも、東京（３１・１度）より札幌（２６・９度）が、４度以上も涼しい。
　近年、東京都の気温は上昇傾向にあり、五輪開催地に立候補した２０１１年、８月の最高気温の平均は３１・２度だったが、今年８月は３２・８度に。女子マラソン開催１年前の８月２日は、最高気温３５・１度の猛暑日を記録している。
　ただ、札幌も日によって気温が上昇し、今年８月には３０度以上の真夏日が８日間あり、２日は３４・２度になった。この日は、気温や湿度などを基に算出した熱中症の目安「暑さ指数（ＷＢＧＴ）」も東京、札幌とも、日本スポーツ協会が激しい運動の中止などを求める危険域に達した。
text:
Hot Sapporo in recent years ... 8 days in August this year, over 30 degrees

01 Nov 2019, 13:30



Odori Park, a promising starting point for marathons (in the afternoon of Chuo-ku, Sapporo) = Photo taken by Takuya Matsumoto

”A race with a marathon whose venue was changed due to the heat of Tokyo, but in recent years Sapporo is also hot.
[Currently, the women ’s marathon will be held on August 2 and the men ’s marathon will be held on the 9th. The average of the highest temperatures in the past 30 years is cooler than 4 degrees in Sapporo (26.9 degrees) than in Tokyo (31.1 degrees) on both days.
”In recent years, the temperature in Tokyo has been on the rise, and the average maximum temperature in August 2011 was 31.2 degrees in 2011 when it was nominated as a venue for the Olympics, but it was 32.8 degrees in August this year. August 2nd, one year before the women's marathon, recorded a hot day with a maximum temperature of 35.1 degrees.
However, the temperature in Sapporo also increased with the sun, and in August of this year, there were eight days of midsummer days of 30 degrees or more, and the second day was 34.2 degrees. On this day, the heat stroke index (WBGT), which was calculated based on temperature, humidity, etc., reached the danger zone where the Japan Sports Association demanded to stop violent exercise in both Tokyo and Sapporo.
